address: via Spangaro 6, località Peseggia di Scorzè
description: Situated in a small rural hamlet, this restaurant is one of the best in the Venetian hinterland for top-quality fish. Served in welcoming dining rooms, the fish and seafood dishes here are traditional and unfussy in style, and full of natural flavour.
